article_title: The End Of Authority: How A Loss Of Legitimacy And Broken Trust Are Endangering Our Future

article_metadata.description: Consider the state of the world today: in Washington, the Democratic and Republican parties finally agreed on a deal to raise the debt ceiling after Tea Party Republicans held the country hostage over their wild goose chase to defund ObamaCare, forcing a 16-day partial government shutdown, rattling markets and bringing [...]
article_metadata.author: Doug Schoen
